definition: The term "rechts" refers to the opposite direction of left, typically used to describe a specific side or position. It commonly denotes the right side of something, such as a person's body, an object, or a location. Additionally, "rechts" can be employed to indicate a political ideology or affiliation.

examples.english: He is standing to the right of me.

examples.german: Die rechte Seite des Buches ist beschädigt.
examples.english: The right side of the book is damaged.
There is a parking lot on the right.

examples.german: Die rechte Hand ist stärker als die linke Hand.
examples.english: The right hand is stronger than the left hand.
